ConsumerBaseFoundation.stf_description: Visita l'Australia seguendo i consigli degli Aussie Specialist, gli agenti di viaggio di Turismo Australia che ti daranno tutte le informazioni che cerchi.
ConsumerBaseFoundation.txt_Teaser: Hai bisogno di un consiglio di un esperto

TopCategoryHighlights.stf_Heading: Find a travel specialist near you
TopCategoryHighlights.txt_Information:
There are thousands of great Australian experiences to choose from. Chances are, your US Aussie Specialist Travel Agent has experienced or planned for them before.

Experts on everything Australian, these specialists receive extensive training from Tourism Australia and most have traveled throughout Australia. They have the experience to help you plan and book your Aussie adventure. They know what to pack, what the weather will be like and how to join in with the locals.

So, if you are wondering what it’s like to sail on Sydney Harbour, feel the warmth of the Australian outback, or dive on the Great Barrier Reef, contact an Aussie Specialist and you’ll soon be enjoying your very own Australian experience.

TopCategoryHighlights.stf_Heading: Find a travel specialist near you
TopCategoryHighlights.txt_Information:
There are thousands of great Australian experiences to choose from. Chances are, your Aussie Specialist Travel Agent has experienced or planned for them before.

Experts on everything Australian, these specialists receive extensive training from Tourism Australia and most have traveled throughout Australia. They have the experience to help you plan and book your Aussie adventure. They know what to pack, what the weather will be like and how to join in with the locals.

So, if you are wondering what it’s like to sail on Sydney Harbour, feel the warmth of the Australian outback, or dive on the Great Barrier Reef, contact an Aussie Specialist and you’ll soon be enjoying your very own Australian experience.

Vi state chiedendo quali emozioni si provano a nuotare nella Grande Barriera Corallina o a restare seduti intorno a un falò dove il crepitio del fuoco rievoca l'antico battito di Corroboree?

È assai probabile che il vostro agente di viaggio Aussie Specialist abbia già vissuto o pianificato questa esperienza. Questi specialisti sanno cosa portare, come sarà il tempo e come entrare in contatto con la comunità locale. E sono pronti e ansiosi di aiutare voi a creare la vostra esperienza australiana.  Questi esperti dell'Australia hanno seguito l'Aussie Specialist Program, promosso da Tourism Australia, e quasi tutti hanno girato il paese in lungo e in largo.

Grandi appassionati dell'Australia, hanno l'esperienza e il know-how giusti per aiutarvi a pianificare e prenotare ogni tappa del vostro viaggio. Contattate un Aussie Specialist e il vostro sogno australiano si materializzerà in un baleno.
